summary.para: The NET_IF_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE enumeration type specifies the NDIS network interface connection state.

remarks.para: The NDIS_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATE enumeration type, used to describe NDIS interface providers in the OID_GEN_MEDIA_CONNECT_STATUS_EX OID, is equivalent to this enumeration.

summary.para: The connection state of the interface is unknown.
The interface is connected to the network.
The interface is not connected to the network.
